message: I propose we split the money 3:2 in my favor. This seems fair given the risk and effort involved.
I think 7:3 is a fair split, considering I'm taking a risk by not accepting your previous offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a decent share.
I believe a 50/50 split is fair, especially considering the uncertainty and potential risks involved. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
